name: Droplet (TheSammyOne)
description:
Welcome to Droplet!

Fight your way through a hostile world deep in the underground with only one goal on your mind - to save your beloved Kim. Samurai will try to slice you up, plants will try to shoot you, and in the end you'll have to face the one thing that stands between you and Kim.

Droplet is a game made by students at Skövde University. It was done in Unity and uses Plattformer Microgame.

The team consists of:

Filip Svanström Gustavsson - Music & Sound
Ida Steenari - Programming
Jiayue "LumenCircle" Cheng - Graphics
Sara "TheSammyOne" Jonasson - Graphics
Michael "Neatless" Rådström - Story
